content.detailedDescription: Here is a map of my location sorry i didnt load it the first time but i just got home from work and was tired... the circle on the left is where i last remember driving. the arrow on the left is what i thought i did and the circle on the right is where i actually was.
content.summary: Semi truck abduction

content.detailedDescription: While driving home in the elizabethtown/hershey area, seen 4 silver fireballs with firey tails midway in the sky, towards the palmyra direction, which slowly were changing directions and weaving among each other. lasted about 12-15 seconds while i was driving, as i happened to look in the direction. unfortunately i couldnt get my cell cam on in time to capture. looked exactly what had been recently been seen in ca described as the "silver surfer ufos", though this was 4 "fireballs" vs the 2 seen in ca.
content.summary: 4 "silver surfer-like" silver fireballs/ufos with firey tails fell from the sky while slowly interchanging directions and weaving among each other

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on the front porch smoking a cigarette. looking up at the sky from under the porch roof(there is supposed to be a storm coming) noticing the sparse clouds and looking up at the stars and planets. (we live near an airport/norfolk international)
there is this (plane??) only with no marker lights moving east north east. 
i waited a few seconds to see if i could see it flash, or to be able to see port side lights. i was not able to see either. 

i thought this to be very unusual and pounded on the window to get my wife's attention (watching tv) she came running out saying what what what.... (typical response..Lol) 

once she was on the porch i pointed and told her look out here..(under the edge) (look at the light) 
she asked me "what is it?"
to which i replied "i have no idea, but it doesn't have marker lights"
the light, a few moments later, dimmed from bright white (more luminous than the stars/planets), to a red light slightly dimmer yet still bright. this lasted approximately 2-3 seconds and then it got much dimmer(sort of like it burned out??) then we could no longer see it. 

i was in the military, navy and have seen missiles launched and would sort of say this was not unlike a tomahawk launch-but with out the smoke, sound, speed of ascent, also i saw no booster fall away..

ie... ufo.
content.summary: Light traveling ene at speed similar to airplane but whith no marker lights and went dark after dimming

content.detailedDescription:
At just after 7:00 pm i was walking up my driveway, when i notice a bright orange light in the eastern sky approximately 30 degrees above the horizon, that appeared to be stationary. i stopped walking to better view the light, when it suddenly changed position, unlike any aircraft i am familiar with.  to get a better view of the light, i went around to the backyard patio, where i then observed the orange light drop suddenly and begin a swooping climb to the south, at which point a pinpoint of blue/white light dropped out of the orange light and appeared to travel in a downward direction and disapear.  the orange light then flickered and suddenly disappeared.  an instant later, the orange light reappeared approximately 10 degrees to the south.  the instant changing of position happened several more times.  after the last apparent change of position, the orange light dimmed to nothing over about 3-4 seconds period of time. after the orange light went out, 3 small evenly spaced lights, in a row, appeared. the left light was green, the middle was orange, and the right was reddish.  this formation of lights slowly moved towards the north and back to the south over about 10 seconds of time, and then dimmed to nothing.  i remained in my viewing location for another few minutes, but did not see any more lights. i walked back around to the driveway and looked around the sky, but did not see any more strange lights.

the area of the sky the light occured in was within about a 12 inch circlular area when viewed from about 3 feet away.  my sense of distance the light was from my viewing location was 3-5 miles. weather conditions at the time were dry, broken overcast with cloud deck at 5,000 to 7,000 feet, and temps of 45-50 degrees.

my sense of the type of light, was that it was pure, if that makes sense. 

i did not feel any fear, only wonder at what i was witnessing.  my feelings after i went into my home were, wow....Did i just witness a ufo?
content.summary: Large bright orange light in sky that moved irregular and changed shape

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to watch the geminid meteor shower, approximately  3am. i was watching from my backyard. after about 5 minutes saw an unknown shape with no lights but a dim reddish brown metalic reflection traveling southwest, low in the sky. it looked like it might have been a mylar balloon but the wind was blowing southeast at the time and it seemed to traveling straight to the southwest. i just saw this object  for a few seconds. just thought it unusual.
 approximately 15 minutes later after seeing a couple of dozen meteors and a couple of planes in the sky. i noticed 3 lights in the shape of a triangleabout the brightness of a medium star traveling directly overhead and due east. this object had no flashing lights, made no sounds, and seemed to be quite large, fast and extremely high in the sky from the lights against the stars in bacground. i couldn't tell if it was solid because it was so far away just seemed to be the same color as the night sky. i watched it as long as i could maybe 10 or 15 seconds.
as many people as should have been watching tne sky that someone else probably saw it too. maybe i'm just the first to say something.
content.summary: Triangle formation of light traveling due east separate. unknown shape traveling sw.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and "chuck" were checking out an abandoned farmhouse late thursday night, early friday morning. i noticed a shooting star, pointed it out to "chuck", when simultaneously we noticed three brighter than normal stars in the northern sky. upon further inspection, we noticed the stars were moving in a southwestern direction and the distance between them never changed. the three "stars" began to get brighter and brighter until they were roughly the size of a small basketball or a large football. at this point, we realized the "stars" were attached to a triangle, boomerang shaped object. the only reason we could tell the shape of the object was because as it moved, it was blocking the stars behind it. there were no clouds in the sky this evening, and it was very quiet and still outside. the object flew directly overhead with no sound. "chuck" noticed the hairs on the back of his neck were standing upright and my hair and scalp had a strange tingling sensation. a short distance from our event there is a small airport, now, we are used to seeing small airplanes take off and land, so we are well aware of the size, appearance and light patterns of these aircraft. in almost a split second, the three "stars" became very intense, we heard an almost mechanical, electrical kind of humming and the object instantly shot off in the direction of nashville. a short time after, we could see and hear helicopters heading directly behind the path the object had been taking. at this point, we realized what we had saw as being the mythical tr3b. from our vantage point, we feel the object was at least two to two and a half football fields in width. we have reported this to no one and have not contacted any agencies in regards to this for fear of retribution or retaliation, or even ridicule. all these events took five minutes in total to unfold. we plan on making nightly trips over the holiday break to try and witness these events again.
content.summary: triangle shaped object, tr3b?

content.detailedDescription: I have spotted satellites reflecting the sun in the night sky from the comfort of the hot tub hundreds of times, this one was different. one night my wife tracie and i were walking to the car and i happened to look up. the night sky was crystal clear and the stars were bright. i saw a moving pinpoint of light traveling in a northerly direction. i pointed it out to tracie and we both watched it for about 45 seconds, until the point of light made a dead left turn without slowing down at all. we watched for another 20 or so seconds until the point of light desappeared over the trees.
content.summary: Oblect that looked like a satellite reflecting the sun made an instant 90 degeree left turn

content.detailedDescription:
I couldn't sleep. everyone else in the house was snug in their beds.
noone was stirring. i went out in my cap and gown[no comments please], and what did i see? a large carriage careening through the air, being propelled by 8 conscripted forest creatures with antlers. their eyes seemed to suggest some sort of magic dust ingestion. the alien[legal?...Can't say] carriage operator appeared to be wearing a large fur-trimmed red spacesuit. they proceeded to land upon residential roofs and invading the houses through the hvac combustion output ventilation systems.
i am very afraid.....Can you assist?
thanks........A concerned citizen
content.summary: Odd carriage-shaped craft with skids

content.detailedDescription: I have filed a report before with you guys about a strange set of birds i filmed back in july of this year (spiritbird) that just decintegrate in mid air with an outward traveling ring of white light or energy. i sent you the video a while back. anyhow i was traveling back to calgary from edmonton, traveling south on the anthony henday highway (216) a little south of stoney plain rd. on the west side of edmonton & the next thing i know i was on a range rd. going north on the east side of the city, missed my junction to the 2 south (calgary) and can't recall how i got there. the (216) is a ring rd. that runs around the city of edmonton from nw to ne. from the west side @ stoney plain to east side to yellow head highway (16) is at least a 15 min drive @ 110 km/h. i did not feel any adverse health affects prior to or after the incedent but i was confused as to how i got there and where i was. now unless i drove for 15 min @ 110 km/h with no conciousness and negotiated multiple curves and not roll off the rd. then something else happend. for the life of me i can't recall that stretch of driving to that point. i was driving ryder rental unit 376767 from the calgary terminal and maybe there is an abnormality on the data recorder. my sense of time off too, like i wasn't even there for it.
content.summary: Suspect i was abducted while driving a semi truck

content.detailedDescription:
On 12/22/2010 at approximately 2210 hours i observed two bright white flashing lights, apparently connected to one structure, flying southwest of my house. the lights appeared to be less than a mile from my house and appeared to be flying at a pretty low altitude (about the same altitude that the local police helicopter flies over on a daily basis). 

i saw the lights from my living room. i am very used to seeing all manner of aircraft flying over the house (all types of military jets, smaller commuter planes, the occasional airliner, tourist helicopters, pavehawk helicopters, police helicopters, even a blimp when they were advertising a new casino.) and i immediately thought to myself that the lights did not look like anything i have ever seen before. i leapt out of my chair, which i do a lot because i like to see what is flying over my house, and went outside. i noticed that there was no noise coming from the lights, which i think i should have heard judging by the distance i think the lights were at. i also realized how quickly the lights seemed to be traveling. in a span of approximately 20 seconds the lights traveled from the northern end of north las vegas to approximately i-15 and sahara ave. 

the lights then traveled to the west and became blocked by the house to the south of mine. i waited a for a while to see if i could see the light continue to travel to the west, but did not see it come back around. the object also seemed to lose elevation as it traveled across the valley. this was not ordinary and have never seen anything like this. i was not scared, but did have a feeling of awe after observing this thinking about how fast this thing must have been flying.
content.summary: Bright white flashing lights, traveling at high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I am unsure of the exact date/year but i am pretty sure 1974 is correct. i was sitting on the porch with my dad and brother when we spotted the disc over our neighborhood. it was right over our heads as close as 100 ft up. silent with a band of lights around the center flashing red green red almost in segments of the craft. instantly, it zipped to the back of our neighborhood then zipped again towards the south and then in a flash, zipped out of sight. no noise. it would move instantly and stop on a dime. the strange part was when it was over there, there were several cars that had stopped to view the event and people were out of their cars looking. no said anything to each other.  they just got in their cars and left. it was like we couldnt speak about it. the next day in the local paper there were many reported sightings. we were on montavista dr. i would love for more people to come out and talk about the event.
content.summary: Disc ove lansdowne merrick subdivision

content.detailedDescription:
I posted in depth details of this encounter a few weeks ago here. i wintnessed this back on march 2, 2007 near boutte, louisiana on highway 90. i can assure you that this encounter was not something from earth! i investigated this very carefully and the investigation included all police departments in and around the area of occurrence. i even spoke with a st. charles parish police officer that was on patrol the night of the event. the officer i spoke with patrolled the area where the event occurred at the exact time the event occurred. he stated he did not see anything and there was no animal reported being hit anywhere around the area i witnessed the event. i believe he is being honest about his testimony. in fact as i was witnessing this event cars were passing by fast as if they did not see anything on the road. i was able to capture 2 pictures that night. if i would have known the significance of this event i would have taken more digital images and also i would have tried to make contact with the people involved at the scene of the accident. 

as reported earlier i know exactly what road i was on and the exact area within a mile of where the event occurred. this road was the only one available going to and from my destination from houma to kenner, louisiana. 

i am adding the link to my original report below if you want to read all of the details. some people that do not have knowledge of animals will look at it and say it is a cow, etc. but it is actually made up of many different types of animals combined! i have had zoologists and cryptozoologists look at it and they cannot determine exactly what type of animal it is. when i witnessed it in person it looked very much like a golden animal (camel). i also witnessed 2 people at the scene of the accident. i thought they would show up in the picture of the car but they did not. maybe they were to far behind the car to show up? the car appears very ghostly as if the back of it fades and there is a image of an alien on the side of the car. the animal appears swollen for some reason and there is a circular pattern on the road next to it. this leads me to believe that something landed on the road by the animal. i have looked this images over many times and i have found unusual things about them. of course the most bizarre is the evil face that appears on the head of the animal when you zoom in on it! see my other post for that picture. 

the place that this event took place is about 15 minutes from my house and sometimes i drive back to this area and usually something strange occurs when i do. i am going to drive back out there tonight and i hope i see something that can help to explain what i witnessed back in 2007. all of the evidence from the accident including the car, animal, blood, glass, etc was gone hours later when i drove back to the scene of occurrence! whatever this event was it was not from earth! there are also unusual images that are embeded into the two pictures i captured that night. some appear to be human faces and possibly words. the words are very difficult to make out. a small object that is white with a red tip appears on the road by the animal. i am not sure what it is? the image of the alien on the side of the car appears to be holding something that looks like a phone. 

my reason for this post is to include two more images. these images are of the ufo's that appear in the sky above this occurrence. you can see different colors around the ufo's that would represent great energy and power coming form the objects! 

i know that the images i captured are something that is very unusual and not of things that normally occur here on earth! i saved the images on the original memory card to preserve the evidence. these images have not been edited or manipulated. the only thing done was the images were they were lightened so you can see them better. these pictures are of something very unusual and i wish that everyone knew the truth about them. i am in hopes that one day someone with photography and paranormal (ufo)investigative knowledge can help me to solve this mystery. *(wit's first name (charles) deleted -- cms/sg).
content.summary: 3 ufo's in the sky with a unknown animal on the road and a mysterious car

content.detailedDescription: Around 1966 iwas looking out the window in my room in the attic around 11or 12 when i saw this circular craft with raised top and bottom windows with lights shining thru there also were rotating red white green alternating on its rim this craft was spinning and falling when suddenly it righted itself spinning   as it did it  started to hop like astone across water i could hear what sounded like glass or instruments breaking it then stopped losing altitude but still spinning like a top it started to move in a southern direction apparently it had incurred some damage because it spinning and woobling and zig zagging as it started to move away like someone drunk was driving it.That night ihad this nightmare when suddenly i realize im not in my room my heart is racing wildly im aware that i am not alone they are trying to calm me saying they mean no harm to me but they dont speak with a voice they are in my head i am very scared and they seem to be concerned about my heart racing they tell me to open my eyes but i dont iam petrified.I try to reason with myself that this isnt real when suddenly my left arm shoots straight up they are controlling my movements telling me evrything is okay islowly slide my right arm over tosee if my brothers are there because we sleep in the same double bed they know im doing this no one was there im on a table then suddenly its morning when i first saw the craft i raced down the stairs jumping and landing at the bottom of the stairs iran to my moms room woke her up she looked out her window she says she saw the craft but im not so sure it was still visible and woobling and spinning.Ihave to many stories to tell in this report i need to talk to someone my nightmares are horrible i need answers i need to talk am i crazy please call me i will submit to a polygraph i am having apocolyptic nightmares my last encounter was three years ago please call *(wit's name and phone number deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Round object red white green spinning woobling zig zagging

content.detailedDescription: I own a travel trailer in howard colorado that is in a storage lot . i went there to get a few things out of storage around 8.00a.M..I pulled up to the camper ,got out of my truck ,skies are mostly clear , but with really odd looking clouds that seemed to catch my attention,orange gray ,in color,,then thats when i noticed the object,bright white not moving ,about5-6 thousand feet elevation watched for a few minutes ,thought it might be a ballon,so i opened the camper and grapped a high powered rifle scope that i had.I focused on it ,sitting in my truck with the door open, and using the whip antenna as a reference point to see if the object moved, it didnt ,for more than an hour and a half.Using the scope i focused in on it ,it seemed to have a red light incircling it, rotating around its circumference. the weather is really good today ,no snow,moving clouds mostly sunny. i  almost got bored watching it ,called a couple friends ,didnt get an answer,,about 9.30am  ,,took another look before i left to go back home to salida ,,thats when i think i saw i guess was a mothership transucent in color long cigar shape very big am guessing quarter mile in length ,moving super fast ,just below the ufo ,maybe 1000 ft. horz. i could make out the outline of it ,the middle seemed to be somewhat transparent.It dissappeared into a cloud ,never came out the other side,i didnt have my camera,,was late for work,, had to go,,by the way .South of here is the san luis valley,,east is norad, this is my first sighting here ,,my friends witnessed the famous salida co. sighting in early 2000.. daytime video  ,, i saw that video ,,looked somewhat similar to what i saw.I saw similar object in 1999 middle of day,, i took pictures of that object,,when the pictures were developed ,, i was in shock,,maybe a dozen smaller orbs or objects flying  around the main object,pictures also showed whitelines or streaks in some frames,, thanks *(wit's first name removed--cms/sg).
content.summary: Bright white object with red light rotating around object

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 3:40 pm, and i was traveling west on highway 50 between mather field blvd and watt ave.  at the time i was looking at a very large, dark cloud hovering about 1 to 2 miles ahead of me.  earlier in the day a couple of funnel clouds had been sighted south of mather field, so i was watching the sky, trying to see if i'd see one too.  

at i was staring at this large black cloud i saw something very odd.  at first i thought it was a very small cloud, but then i realized it was perfectly square, and traveling against all the other clouds in a straight line.  the storm was heading east towards the sierras, and this object was heading north.  the size was approximate to my thumb nail (about 1/2 inch in diameter in the sky), and it was white, but partially transparent (i could see the dark cloud through it).  and it was moving very quickly!  in the time i said, "what the hell is that? what ..." it was gone.  it just vanished out of sight.

i have never in my 48 years ever seen anything like that.
content.summary: Square, partially transparent white craft seen traveling in a straight line

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on i-435 at 69 hwy in overland park and saw 3 lit craft straight ahead of me.  they weren't in formation, but were low, probably less than 3k feet and 1-2 miles away.  two of them were together, then after 15 seconds or so, the other joined the two and they all continued flying east out of our sight.  probably had sight of them for a total of 2-3 minutes. couldn't hear them, but they all had 1 or 2 blinking lights on them and couldn't make out shapes.  the only reason i write this is because i don't see 3 aircraft like that flying together over the city together like that.  plus, from the movement, and slower speed, i thought they were helicopters if anything, but not real sure.  curious if anyone else saw them and can straighten me out! ;)
content.summary: 3 craft flying low over the city & could see only lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on redbridge road in kansas city a little past 7 pm last night and i saw unusual white lights above tree line coming from the overland park area from the west, coming towards me. there were three bright lights. object looked quite big. as it flew closer, it looked like a triangle, that's what i thought. i actually pulled off the road, got out of my car and watched this thing fly, literally, over my head slowly and very low, maybe several hundred feet up, over the road. it made a noise like a flying craft of some sort. 

there were three lights on each point, so to me it really seemed triangular. it was really strange, it was completely grayed out, meaning that you couldn't see any real shape. last night was cloudy, but not black. this thing was just a little darker shade grey that barely could be made out. i tried to get a pic or video, but couldn't get it in time. it was big, flying fairly low and went towards grandview to the east. incidentally, another guy pulled up to me asking me what in the world that was. so, this thing was big and all the drivers on the road no doubt could have seen it like me. it looked larger than a house.

i called the local police shortly after this to report it and to see if others had reported it. at that time, no one else reported it yet.

honestly, this thing was the strangest aircraft i had seen with my eyes. it didn't look like a 'normal' plane with blinking lights, etc.

i have never reported anything like this before.
content.summary: Large triagular ufo over street in kansas city

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my driveway admireing my neighbors x-mas lights when i first noticed 2 glowing orange spheres in the north sky. they were moving slowly from west to east. then suddenly, 2 more spheres appeared behind the first 2, traveling in the same direction. i pointed them out to my son, who is 20. as we watched, the first 2 spheres disappeared completely, but the second 2 spheres continued on thier path to the east until they were out of sight. we stood there for a minute or so trying to figure out what we had seen. my son decided to go back in the house, but i stayed outside. suddenly, from the west, i saw a bright cigar/cylinder shaped object moving to the east, but much closer to me and going in a slightly southern direction. i yelled for my son to come out and as he did he was able to see it also before it was obscured by a large tree just down the street. it was a full moon, so i was able to see this thing clearly. it had a sort of quicksilver look to it and i was able to make out a row of square shaped windows that were illuminated. looked to be 4 or 5 windows and i could see the pillars between them. there were no blinking lights or colored lights at all. just white light coming from the windows and the moon light reflecting off the outside of it. there were no wings, and it made no sound. i did not see any type of vapor trail or any obvious method of propulsion. i was just there, moving across the sky at a rapid rate, until we lost sight of it. i estimate the entire event was no more than 3 mins from first seeing the orange spheres until the end when the silver craft went behind the tree.
   i did notice another neighbor in thier yard right after this and i went down to ask them if they had seen this thing. they said no, they had been working on x-mas lights and had not noticed anything unusual.
   i was pretty freaked out by it, and did not sleep much last night. i got up several times to look out the window to see what was out there. nothing else happened. i got up this morning and decided to make a report to mufon.
content.summary: 4 glowing orange spheres followed by a silver cigar/cylinder shape with windows.

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting occured back around the mid 1970s when me and two of my buddies were out at pensacola beach at a sand dune called the cross because there is a permanent structure of a cross on top of the sand dune.
we were standing next to the water on the gulf of mexico facing the water
when one of my buddies noticed the object and he stated "dudes check it out a ufo" so we turned towards it. there was no wind that night and the gulf was as quite as a lake. the object was traveling paralell to the road
maybe 100 to 150 feet above the road. the objecct appeared to be a sphere
of solid white light. so we started jumping up and down waving and shouting at it and low and behold the object chaged directions and came directly towards us and and in no time the object was almost on top of us. the object made no sound whatsoever and at the last second my friend that spotted the craft shouted run so we took off running for the direction of the sand dunes towards the road. never run so fast in my life and somehow escaped the object. we gatherd back together in the sand dunes and then my friend who originally spotted it saw it again as it resumed its paralell course on the road heading eastward. there is a large water tank it came close to and would guess the object to be about the size of the tank part of it. and it i had to guess would say the diameter of it was about 35 to 40 feet. then the object did somthing strange as we watched it go past the water tank. that part of the beach was lighted up pretty well with business in that area. the object went almost pitch black and all we could make out was a sphere silloett of the object. so i guess they have the ability to turn off the lights on the craft so as not to be seen at night time. then the object disappeared in the distance and was gone. ok credibility the friend that spotted it had like a four point zero grade average at a local college. me and my friend both went through radar school in the navy about the same time. the other friend was going through a trade school. interesting note the friend going through the trade school said he claimed to see a similar object go into the gulf waters. this paticular friend is almost leagally blind but claims he can see better at night than in the daytime. prefer to remain anonymous on this because of the real men in black are out there and no one wants a visit from them as documented in one of times lifes books i think is where i read about them. just one last humorous note to the sighting we hadn't even opened the bottle of wine we had with us that night which we gulped down afterwards. lucky we all didn't end up on jupiter that night. well that was our sighting event. this thing was practically directly over our heads when we took off running. sarry stuff! don;t remember any missing time. weather balloons cant change course as this object did as it made a beeline toward us. well thats about it on the sighting. i am a firm believer in the bible and it states somewhere in revelations before the end of time there will be strange lights in the sky. i believe it.
content.summary: Three eyewitness sighting pensacola beach object came after us we ran and watched object dissapear

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i went out to do some christmas shopping at the grove in hollywood. (the grove is an outdoor shopping mall) it had been raining non stop for the past three days and was raining heavily today in particular. just after a few minutes before we arrive at the grove the rain had stopped. i noticed that  a lot of people were pointing at the sky and taking pictures. in the wake of the storm was a brilliant double rainbow, so i decided to take some photos myself. as i was about to take the picture i noticed through the screen on my cell, 4 orb like objects in front of the rainbow that were not there seconds prior. i stared at through the screen in awe. i have never seen a ufo/s in my life but always wanted to so badly. and here i was experiencing it. they were gliding effortlessly in tandem in the sky right in front of this beautiful rainbow. it was perfect. as i took the picture my phone died. i look up from my phone, they were gone. not sure if the photo came out or not. when i arrived home i immediately connected my phone to my computer. and there they were, the four objects i saw. the picture doesn't to them justice but none the less, i captured them. 3 orbs or lights above and 1 below. one object in particular that i find interesting is the one in the middle. it almost looks like a creature attached to it. if anyone else saw this event, please post.
content.summary: 4 orbs appeared out of nowhere

content.detailedDescription: That day was somewhat unexplainable planable pryyyable.Photos of encounter are posted on *link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg.Theres many questions and mystery on why certain worlds were exposed on that day. call *(phone number moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg) with some info on photo evidence.
content.summary: Images in sand the grays greets greeks.

content.detailedDescription: At aprox. 21:06 centeral i was on the balcony of my moms apartment. in the sky i noticed 4 objects in a v pattern. at first i thought they were lights from a airplane being that dfw airport is right down the road. then i realized that they were stationary. at first i thought maybe they were a group of helicopters but they wernt putting off any sound. also with dfw being a extremly controled airspace no group of helicopters would ever come to a hover in formation (i use to work for dhs). i quickly got my mom and her boyfriend to confirm that i was not going crazy. one started to fade off into the distance. as soon as that one was out of view another shot up from what looked like the ground. it moved at the rate of a missile but also with no sound. the area it appeared to come from is about 300 yards away. i watched as they all started to fade off into the sky. it was one of the stragest things that has happend to me yet. i wanted to belive that it was man made but im not sure. i am a skeptic by nature and this totaly threw me for a loop. i deffently will think twice before putting some ones oppion off on ufo's.
content.summary: 4 objects in a v formation all were self luminescent and jellyfish shapped.

content.detailedDescription: This is the silver ufo that i reported earlier in the week.  this is some clearer footage.
content.summary: Ufo silver disk....Truth!!!!!

content.detailedDescription:
Got out of work at 5:15. started driving home which isnt too far, about 2 minute drive. i got out of my car and instantly noticed a bright white strobing light. i knew it wasnt a plane, because planes frequently fliy about my area/house and there lights are usually a yellowish white hue with green/red strobing along. 

this object was strobing white

after i got out of my car, i ran into my house grabbed my kodak playsport which shoots in hd and then ran out and started to record.

when i was recording, the strobe of the object was slow. then after zoomng in the pulses of strobe appear to go off faster then again slower. it was a t a weird-random "rythm". 

after recording it for a min or so, it disappeared behind my neighbors house
content.shape: Blimp,   Circle,   Flash,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Quick random white strobing of lights

content.detailedDescription:
I am finally telling my story which i believe happened in 1985 give or take a year. my small dog was very sick, on his last day on earth. i came home from work to let him out at lunch time. carried him outside, and being tired i propped myself against the basement stair railing. watched the dog and then looked up in the sky and saw this huge (very large) craft in the sky, lower sky. i put my head down to check the dog and then it occured to me what i saw. un-believable it was it was so large, sparkled so much around the middle that i never have seen that sparkle since even though i look for it, yes still do. the craft was low. then all of a sudden i saw it start to disappear from my left to right, just like someone put a veil to cover it, it disappeared just like that. i never heard any noise, nothing. i picked up my dog, thought to myself what i saw and living in a small town here in pa. decided not to say anything. however, in about a half hour i did telephone the local radio station and without giving my name asked them if anyone called about a strange craft in the sky. no was the answer and i hung up, then telephoned the lancaster airport (small) and was told a man did telephone about a strange craft, i hung up before giving my name. told my husband and a few people.

then we lived in arizona for a about eight years. one night about ten-ish
before going to bed i decided to have a smoke on the deck. i sat down and looked out to the sky (not high in the sky) and saw these lights. even though we lived near luke airforce base i never heard a noise. i watched these lights and again never thinking of a ufo, i watched them. if it was a ufo it was large, almost as large as the one i saw in akron. next morning in the newspaper there was an article on the lights. 

yes, i believe there are ufo's, if not our government is lying to us on their air craft. i know what i saw, and am not one to make up things, do not need the attention one gets from making up things. i shall never forget what i saw either in akron. pa or surprise, arizona. i am now 76 years old and my neighbor wanted me to report this to you. took me about six or so months before doing so.

thank you,
content.summary: Something that i never saw beforetoo large too weird too much sparkle, too fast and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Numerous sightings on nyc webcams via earth cam. almost every night mysterious objects flying over nyc and nj on cam. different colors and shapes and sometimes way to close together to be airplanes. also strange activity over patagonia, chile webcam last night, crazy lights in sky flying rapidly in all directions. how is this not a top story on our news? why is no one doing anything about this? our own airspace is being invaded. what gives?!
content.summary: Disc shape object on nyc earthcam captured with screen shot on iphone

content.detailedDescription: Driving on 340 west/south, past 180.  saw two bright lights coming towards me about 50-100 feet above ground.  they were softball size/shape, about 6-12 inches apart.  thought it could be radio controlled plane.
content.summary: Two softball size lights, approx 6-12 inches apart

content.detailedDescription: On june 5th i did a worldwide internet meditation lead by lyssa royal holt held by paranormal matrix for "first contact".  many things have happened since then but i was never afraid until lately.  a week following the meditation i woke and while taking a shower my stomach was burning.  looking down i had (5) 1 inch cuts leading out of my navel and (1) 2 inch cut to the left of my navel.  i wasn't alarmed, in fact, felt very calm.  i showed the cuts to my husband.  i have a scar from the cut next to my navel.  many strange things have happened since.  i am irritated with myself for doing the meditation but i felt very compelled to do it at the time.  i opened the door to communication and now i want it to stop.  i contacted paranormal matrix for help regarding this situation but they have never responded.  i emailed mufon abductions last week and i have had no response from them either.  i did have a close ufo sighting in 2008.  i reported it in 2009 after someone else saw the same thing a yr after i saw it.  they had photographed it and my photos did not come out with anything.  i am willing to be hypnotized.
content.summary: Contact and abduction

content.detailedDescription: I was talking on my cell at the end of my sidewalk by the steet when i turned around facing my house and saw this huge black man bird thing gliding without a noise coming from the east maybe the distance would be like three streets over but about maybe five blocks down.[which three steets over there isnt five blocks because the woods are two blocks down. when i saw this i was stunned and stared at it trying to figure out what it was and then i saw it wasnt anything ive ever seen. i ran into the house and yelled at my husband and my grown son to get out here quick. they came but seemed like forever and they looked and saw it too. when they saw it they thing was like the a few streets over and then disappeared behind the big trees.  when we saw it we all said that no one would believe us; but i have recently been talking about it because it has bothered me so much. i lived in this neighborhood all my life and i can remember of three ufo sightings since i was five and all the sightings were in this neighborhood or around stinson field airport. i never came forward about them because people think ya lost your ever loving mind until recently when others ive spoke with shared their experiences. i have other stories but this one is the most recent and i was wondering if anyone has ever seen this thing. it is silent like it was a glider but i could see the body was exactly like a man a very large man. thank you for listening to me and i hope you dont think we have gone mad too. i called my daughter and told her afterwards and thats what made my mind up to stay silent.  i had my darn cell on my the whole time and not once thought of taking a picture it happened so fast and im not that savy on the cell.
content.summary: It was about 7 or 8 ft long black looked like a mans body with ft wing span about double head size of human but rouded like bird big long beak

content.detailedDescription: *(name deleted--cms/sg) and i pulled over when i saw something near the moon (which looked lower than normal).  the object left a cloud behind...It was ascending upward and fast.  that is what made me pull over.  *(name deleted--cms/sg) thought it was initially a plane but then it shot across the sky towards us and then went upward again.  we next saw 2 in the same area appear from nowhere (these looked like planes, they had the red and white blinking lights a plane has) but only one made noise?  i saw another object which appeared out of nowhere almost (or maybe i didn't see which direction it came from).  this object was the 2nd object that i saw go completley upward. the objects weren't a completley look of a flying saucer, but they did have a bit of a circle shape.  it was something like a square and circle kind of object...This one had more lights, they looked like they were red and white.  i have never seen objects move this fast...Wasn't like a plane or a jet, and they disappeared pretty quick.
content.summary: Saw 5 or 6 objects near each other, 2 or 3 couldve been planes but two have never seen before
